short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity helps people and groups more efficiently and effectively manage their time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personal productivity application helps to manage your recordings in your contacts, it allows you to add new tasks for your contacts, upload necessary files and many more. Our application is still under development, we are working to satisfy all your needs!
